_header: For he may lease and he may find
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, love of; love, of Christ
_description: Christ’s love for man — two couplets in a Latin sermon

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
ffor he mai leese & he mai fyndeHe mai loose & he mai
                    byȝndeHis will is to do qwat þou wiltBut lothe him were that
                    þou were spilt
